name: graphql-react-node-mongodb-svelte-example
description: A full-stack example with GraphQL, React, Node.js, MongoDB and Svelte

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client-react && npm install && cd ../client-svelte && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client-react" "npm run client-svelte"
